SELECT T1.ITG_DP_NO/*통합입금번호*/ , T1.RVE_CD /*수납코드*/ , T4.SELL_TP_CD/*판매유형*/ , T4.SELL_PRTNR_NO/*판매자번호*/ , T1.DP_TP_CD /*입금유형*/ , T1.DP_DTM /*입금일자*/ , T1.DPR_NM /*입금자명*/ , T1.DP_AMT /*입금금액*/ , T1.DP_BLAM /*입금잔액*/ , T1.FNIT_CD AS BANK_CD /*은행코드*/ , T2.FNIT_NM AS BANK_NM/*은행명*/ , T1.ACNO_ENCR /*계좌번호*/ , T1.CARD_KND_CD /*카드구분*/ , T1.CRCDNO_ENCR /*카드번호*/ , T3.FNIT_NM AS CARD_NM /*카드명*/ , T1.CRDCD_APR_DTM /*승인일자*/ , T1.CRDCD_APRNO/*승인번호*/ , T4.DP_CPRCNF_NO/*대사번호*/ , T4.DP_CPRCNF_AMT/*대사금액*/ , T4.DP_CPRCNF_DTM/*입금대사일자*/ , T1.VNCO_DV_CD /*제휴사구분코드*/ , T1.PCHS_CDCO_CD /*매입카드사*/ , T1.CRDCD_ISTM_MCN/*할부개월*/ , T1.DP_CPRCNF_AMT AS DP_GICPRCNF_AMT /*기대사금액*/ FROM TB_RVDW_ITG_DP_BAS T1/*통합입금기본*/ LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_RVDW_FNIT_CD T2 ON T2.FNIT_CD = T1.FNIT_CD AND T2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_RVDW_FNIT_CD T3 ON T3.FNIT_CD = T1.CRDCD_FNIT_CD AND T3.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT S1.KW_GRP_CO_CD , SUM(S1.DP_CPRCNF_AMT) AS DP_CPRCNF_AMT , MAX(S1.DP_CPRCNF_NO) AS DP_CPRCNF_NO , MAX(S1.DP_CPRCNF_DTM) AS DP_CPRCNF_DTM , S1.ITG_DP_NO , S2.SELL_TP_CD , MAX(S3.SELL_PRTNR_NO) AS SELL_PRTNR_NO FROM TB_RVDW_DP_CPRCNF_BAS S1 JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_DTL S2 ON S2.CNTR_NO = S1.CNTR_NO AND S2.CNTR_SN = S1.CNTR_SN AND S2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_BAS S3 ON S3.CNTR_NO = S2.CNTR_NO AND S3.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' WHERE 1 = 1 AND S1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' GROUP BY S1.KW_GRP_CO_CD , S1.ITG_DP_NO , S2.SELL_TP_CD ) T4 ON T4.KW_GRP_CO_CD = T1.KW_GRP_CO_CD AND T4.ITG_DP_NO = T1.ITG_DP_NO WHERE 1 = 1 AND T1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N'
AND T1.RVE_CD = #{rveCd}/*수납코드*/
AND T1.DP_DTM >= #{dpStartDtm}||'000000' AND T1.DP_DTM <= #{dpEndDtm}||'235959'
AND T1.DP_TP_CD = #{dpTpCd} /*입금유형*/
AND T1.DP_TP_CD IN ('0101','0104','0201') /*입금유형*/
AND T1.ACNO_ENCR = #{acnoEncr} /*계좌번호*/
AND T4.SELL_PRTNR_NO = #{sellPrtnrNo} /*판매자번호*/
AND T1.CRCDNO_ENCR = #{crcdnoEncr} /*카드번호*/
AND T1.CRDCD_APRNO = #{crdcdAprno} /*승인번호*/
ORDER BY T1.ITG_DP_NO ASC , T1.DP_DTM
